title: Tuna Egg Salad
ingredients: ['2 hard-boiled eggs', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '2 tablespoons soured cream', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon mustard', '1 teaspoon dried dill', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon grated lemon zest', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 (185g) tins tuna in water, drained']
